description:
"Holy shit man," Calvin said, amazed. "You drenched me!"
Franklin just kind of smiled. He had just blasted cum all over Calvin's back.
"Sorry about that," he said, and then laughed.
Franklin knew his load was going to be big. He was excited!
Earlier, we had been kidding around with Franklin about his balls.
He said he has trouble finding pants that can accommodate them and he has to be careful when sitting!
"With balls that big," I said, "you must nut big all the time!"
"Usually," he replied.
Of course, that made Calvin really curious. He asked to see Franklin's balls, and Franklin was happy to oblige.
"Damn," Calvin said. "I thought mine were big. That's insane!"
title: Franklin & Calvin
